ã¯ã˜ã‚ã«

ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ã¯Ruby Advent Calendar 201715æ—¥ç›®ã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ã™ã€‚
é…ããªã£ã¦ã™ã¿ã¾ã›ã‚“ğŸ’¦
GTKã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã‚‚èª¿ã¹ãªãŒã‚‰æ›¸ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€
é–“é•ã„ãªã©ã‚ã£ãŸã‚‰ã”æŒ‡æ‘˜ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ä»Šå›ã¯Rubyã§GTKã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚¯ãƒªã‚¨ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã«ã¤ã„ã¦æ›¸ããŸã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
GTKã¨è¨€ã£ã¦ã‚‚OpenGLã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸæç”»ãªã©ã€
è‰²ã€…ã‚ã‚‹ãã†ãªã®ã§ä»Šå›ã¯Cairo(Gtk::DrawingArea)ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚‚ã®ã‚’ç´¹ä»‹ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã¾ãšruby-gnome2ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«æ–¹æ³•ã¯ä»¥å‰ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã«æ›¸ã„ãŸã®ã§å‚è€ƒã«ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

ä½¿ã„æ–¹

ã¾ãšã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã«å††ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
context.scale 0.5, 0.5ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€
ãªãœã‹2å€ã§è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã‚“ã§ã™ã‘ã©ãªã‚“ã§ãªã‚“ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†â€¦â€¦

require 'gtk3'

width = 300
height = 300

window = Gtk::Window.new
window.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area = Gtk::DrawingArea.new
drawing_area.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area.signal_connect(:draw) do
  context = drawing_area.window.create_cairo_context
  context.scale 0.5, 0.5

  # background color
  context.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
  context.paint 1.0

  # fill color
  context.set_source_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
  # arc(x, y, r, start, end)
  context.arc(width / 2, height / 2, 150, 0, 2 * Math::PI)
  context.fill
end

fixed = Gtk::Fixed.new
fixed.put(drawing_area, 0, 0)
window.add(fixed)

window.show_all
window.signal_connect(:destroy) { Gtk.main_quit }

Gtk.main

ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ«

ã›ã£ã‹ããªã‚“ã§ã‚ˆãã‚ã‚‹å††ã®å…¥ã‚Œå­ã«ãªã£ãŸãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ«ã‚‚æ›¸ãã¾ã™ã€‚

require 'gtk3'

width = 300
height = 300

window = Gtk::Window.new
window.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area = Gtk::DrawingArea.new
drawing_area.set_size_request(width, height)

def draw_circle(context, x, y, r, c = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0])
  context.set_source_rgba(c)
  context.arc(x, y, r, 0, 2 * Math::PI)
  context.stroke
end

def draw_fractal_circle(context, x, y, r, c = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0], n)
  return nil if n < 0
  draw_circle context, x, y, r, c
  next_r = r / 2
  x1 = x - next_r
  draw_fractal_circle context, x1, y, next_r, c, n - 1
  x2 = x + next_r
  draw_fractal_circle context, x2, y, next_r, c, n - 1
end

drawing_area.signal_connect(:draw) do
  context = drawing_area.window.create_cairo_context
  context.scale 0.5, 0.5
  context.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
  context.paint 1.0

  x = width / 2
  y = height / 2
  r = 150
  red = 0.1
  green = 0.7
  blue = 1.0
  alpha = 0.5
  draw_fractal_circle context, x, y, r, [red, green, blue, alpha], 5
end

fixed = Gtk::Fixed.new
fixed.put(drawing_area, 0, 0)
window.add(fixed)

window.show_all
window.signal_connect(:destroy) { Gtk.main_quit }

Gtk.main

ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ãƒã‚¤ã‚º

ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹GemãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ã§ã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ã€
ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸè¡¨ç¾ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
perlin_noise

require 'gtk3'
require 'perlin_noise'

width = 300
height = 300

window = Gtk::Window.new
window.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area = Gtk::DrawingArea.new
drawing_area.set_size_request(width, height)

def draw_circle(context, x, y, r, c = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0])
  context.set_source_rgba(c)
  context.arc(x, y, r, 0, 2 * Math::PI)
  context.fill
end

n2d = Perlin::Noise.new 2, interval: 5
contrast = Perlin::Curve.contrast(Perlin::Curve::CUBIC, 2)

drawing_area.signal_connect(:draw) do
  context = drawing_area.window.create_cairo_context
  context.scale 0.5, 0.5
  context.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
  context.paint 1.0
  0.step(width, width / 10) do |x|
    0.step(height, height / 10) do |y|
      n = n2d[x * 0.01, y * 0.01]
      n = contrast.call n
      r = (width / 10 / 2) * n
      red = 1.0
      green = 1.0
      blue = 1.0
      alpha = n
      draw_circle context, x, y, r, [red, green, blue, alpha]
    end
  end
end

fixed = Gtk::Fixed.new
fixed.put(drawing_area, 0, 0)
window.add(fixed)

window.show_all
window.signal_connect(:destroy) { Gtk.main_quit }

Gtk.main

ã¾ã¨ã‚

ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã§Rubyã§ã‚‚ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¨ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
ä»Šå›ã¯é™æ­¢ç”» + å††ç¸›ã‚Šã«ãªã£ã¡ã‚ƒã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
ã“ã‚Œã¯ã“ã‚Œã§ã‚¹ã‚±ãƒƒãƒæ„Ÿè¦šã§æ¥½ã—ã„ã§ã™ãŒã€
ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã‹ã‚‚ã‚„ã£ã¦ã¿ãŸã„ã§ã™ã€‚

# ã¯ã˜ã‚ã«

ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ã¯[Ruby Advent Calendar 2017](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2017/ruby)15æ—¥ç›®ã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ã™ã€‚
é…ããªã£ã¦ã™ã¿ã¾ã›ã‚“ğŸ’¦
GTKã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã‚‚èª¿ã¹ãªãŒã‚‰æ›¸ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€
é–“é•ã„ãªã©ã‚ã£ãŸã‚‰ã”æŒ‡æ‘˜ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ä»Šå›ã¯Rubyã§GTKã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚¯ãƒªã‚¨ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã«ã¤ã„ã¦æ›¸ããŸã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
GTKã¨è¨€ã£ã¦ã‚‚OpenGLã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸæç”»ãªã©ã€
è‰²ã€…ã‚ã‚‹ãã†ãªã®ã§ä»Šå›ã¯Cairo(Gtk::DrawingArea)ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚‚ã®ã‚’ç´¹ä»‹ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã¾ãšruby-gnome2ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«æ–¹æ³•ã¯ä»¥å‰[ã“ã¡ã‚‰](https://qiita.com/enkatsu/items/a5b15ee2aa8913b4f554)ã«æ›¸ã„ãŸã®ã§å‚è€ƒã«ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

# ä½¿ã„æ–¹

ã¾ãšã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã«å††ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
`context.scale 0.5, 0.5`ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€
ãªãœã‹2å€ã§è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã‚“ã§ã™ã‘ã©ãªã‚“ã§ãªã‚“ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†â€¦â€¦


```ruby
require 'gtk3'

width = 300
height = 300

window = Gtk::Window.new
window.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area = Gtk::DrawingArea.new
drawing_area.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area.signal_connect(:draw) do
  context = drawing_area.window.create_cairo_context
  context.scale 0.5, 0.5

  # background color
  context.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
  context.paint 1.0

  # fill color
  context.set_source_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
  # arc(x, y, r, start, end)
  context.arc(width / 2, height / 2, 150, 0, 2 * Math::PI)
  context.fill
end

fixed = Gtk::Fixed.new
fixed.put(drawing_area, 0, 0)
window.add(fixed)

window.show_all
window.signal_connect(:destroy) { Gtk.main_quit }

Gtk.main
```

# ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ«

ã›ã£ã‹ããªã‚“ã§ã‚ˆãã‚ã‚‹å††ã®å…¥ã‚Œå­ã«ãªã£ãŸãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ«ã‚‚æ›¸ãã¾ã™ã€‚

```ruby
require 'gtk3'

width = 300

window = Gtk::Window.new
window.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area = Gtk::DrawingArea.new
drawing_area.set_size_request(width, height)

def draw_circle(context, x, y, r, c = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0])
  context.set_source_rgba(c)
  context.arc(x, y, r, 0, 2 * Math::PI)
  context.stroke
end

def draw_fractal_circle(context, x, y, r, c = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0], n)
  return nil if n < 0
  draw_circle context, x, y, r, c
  next_r = r / 2
  x1 = x - next_r
  draw_fractal_circle context, x1, y, next_r, c, n - 1
  x2 = x + next_r
  draw_fractal_circle context, x2, y, next_r, c, n - 1
end

drawing_area.signal_connect(:draw) do
  context = drawing_area.window.create_cairo_context
  context.scale 0.5, 0.5
  context.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
  context.paint 1.0

  x = width / 2
  y = height / 2
  r = 150
  red = 0.1
  green = 0.7
  blue = 1.0
  alpha = 0.5
  draw_fractal_circle context, x, y, r, [red, green, blue, alpha], 5
end

fixed = Gtk::Fixed.new
fixed.put(drawing_area, 0, 0)
window.add(fixed)

window.show_all
window.signal_connect(:destroy) { Gtk.main_quit }

Gtk.main

```

# ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ãƒã‚¤ã‚º

ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹GemãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ã§ã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ã€
ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸè¡¨ç¾ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

```ruby
require 'gtk3'
require 'perlin_noise'

width = 300
height = 300

window = Gtk::Window.new
window.set_size_request(width, height)

drawing_area = Gtk::DrawingArea.new
drawing_area.set_size_request(width, height)

def draw_circle(context, x, y, r, c = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0])
  context.set_source_rgba(c)
  context.arc(x, y, r, 0, 2 * Math::PI)
  context.fill
end

n2d = Perlin::Noise.new 2, interval: 5
contrast = Perlin::Curve.contrast(Perlin::Curve::CUBIC, 2)

drawing_area.signal_connect(:draw) do
  context = drawing_area.window.create_cairo_context
  context.scale 0.5, 0.5
  context.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
  context.paint 1.0
  0.step(width, width / 10) do |x|
    0.step(height, height / 10) do |y|
      n = n2d[x * 0.01, y * 0.01]
      n = contrast.call n
      r = (width / 10 / 2) * n
      red = 1.0
      green = 1.0
      blue = 1.0
      alpha = n
      draw_circle context, x, y, r, [red, green, blue, alpha]
    end
  end
end

fixed = Gtk::Fixed.new
fixed.put(drawing_area, 0, 0)
window.add(fixed)

window.show_all
window.signal_connect(:destroy) { Gtk.main_quit }

Gtk.main
```

# ã¾ã¨ã‚

ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã§Rubyã§ã‚‚ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¨ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
ä»Šå›ã¯é™æ­¢ç”» + å††ç¸›ã‚Šã«ãªã£ã¡ã‚ƒã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

rendered_body:
ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ã¯å‰µè–¬ Advent Calendar 2017ã®16æ—¥ç›®ã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ã™ã€‚

ãã£ã‹ã‘

å‰µè–¬ã‚¢ãƒ‰ã‚«ãƒ¬ãŒä¸€ã¤ç©ºã„ã¦ã„ãŸã®ã§å…ˆè¼©(15æ—¥ç›®ã®äºº)ã®å¼·çƒˆãªãƒ—ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šè¨˜äº‹ã‚’æ›¸ãã“ã¨ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ä½•ã‚‚ãƒã‚¿ãŒãªã„ã®ã§æ˜¨æ—¥æ›¸ã„ãŸã€åŒ–å­¦åå¿œã®ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆä½œæˆæ”¯æ´ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ (Rè¨€èª)ã‚’è²¼ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ã æœªå®Œæˆãªã®ã§çªã£è¾¼ã¿ã©ã“ã‚ãŒæº€è¼‰ã§ã™ã€‚ä¿®æ­£ãƒ»ææ¡ˆã‚ã‚Œã°ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ï¼
æ°—ãŒå‘ã‘ã°ãã®ã†ã¡ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸åŒ–ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ 

ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€åã‚’ã‚‚ã¨ã«ã©ã‚“ã©ã‚“ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’ã¤ãªã’ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚
ã“ã‚Œã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã€åŒ–å­¦åå¿œè§£æã®ãƒ¬ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ä½œæˆãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ã‚’è‡ªå‹•åŒ–ã—å†ç¾æ€§ã‚’é«˜ãã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€åã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¯ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

xè»¸é †ç•ª_çŠ¶æ…‹_ãƒ©ãƒ™ãƒ«_ãƒ¡ãƒ¢_åå¿œé€²è¡Œå‰ã®åˆ†å­(ã¨ã‚ã‚Œã°ç³»å¤–ç³»ä¸­ã‹ã‚‰ã®è©¦è–¬ã®åæ”¯)
  • åå¿œé€²è¡Œå‰ã®åˆ†å­ã€ã«ç›´å‰ã®æ§‹é€ ã®ãƒ©ãƒ™ãƒ«ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’ã¤ãªã„ã§ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚
  • åå¿œç‰©ï¼ˆé–‹å§‹æ™‚ï¼‰ã®å ´åˆã¯ã€Œåå¿œé€²è¡Œå‰ã®åˆ†å­ã€ã¯åå¿œç‰©ã®åå‰ã‚’ãã®ã¾ã¾ä½¿ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
  • åå¿œè©¦è–¬ã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã¯ã€Œåå¿œé€²è¡Œå‰ã®åˆ†å­ã€ã¯å…¥åŠ›ãªã—ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã®ä¸­ã§Rã‚’é–‹ãã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’æ‰“ã¡è¾¼ã‚ã°ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆãŒå‡ºã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªãŒå…¥ã£ã¦ã„ãªã„å ´åˆã¯install.package("R6")ãªã©ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

chemicalreactionprofiler.R
library(R6)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)

Total <- R6Class("Total",
                 public = list(
                   Ids = list(),
                   links = matrix(),
                   init = function() self$Ids <- list(),
                   add = function(x){
                     self$Ids <- c(self$Ids, x)
                   },
                   getEntryFor = function(id){
                     for(x in self$Ids){
                       if(x$id == id) return(x)
                     }
                     return(NULL)
                   },
                   getTotalStrings = function(strings, list = NULL){
                     if(is.null(list)) list <- strsplit(strings, split = "\\+|\\-")[[1]]
                     if(length(list) == 0 || is.na(list)){
                       return(strings)
                     }else{
                       firstInout <- self$getEntryFor(list[1])$atomsInout
                       if(is.na(firstInout) && length(list) == 1) return(Recall(strings, list()))
                       if(firstInout == list[1] && length(list) == 1) return(Recall(strings, list()))
                       if(firstInout == list[1] || is.na(firstInout)) return(Recall(strings, list[-1]))
                       strings <- gsub(list[1], firstInout, strings)
                       list <- c(strsplit(firstInout, split = "\\+|\\-")[[1]], list[-1])
                       return(Recall(strings, list))
                     }

                   },
                   fixEnergy = function(startId){
                     for(x in self$Ids){
                       strings <- self$getTotalStrings(x$atomsInout)
                       if(is.na(strings)){
                         srtings <- "0"
                       }else if(strings == x$id){#ä¸€ç•ªæœ€åˆã®å ´åˆ
                         strings <- paste0("as.numeric(self$getEntryFor(\"",strings,"\")$energy) * 2")
                       }else{
                         strings <- paste0(x$id,"-",strings)
                         for(str in unique(strsplit(strings, split = "\\+|\\-")[[1]])){
                           if(str == "NA"){
                             strings <- gsub("NA", "0", strings)
                           }
                           else {
                             strings <- gsub(str, paste0("as.numeric(self$getEntryFor(\"",str,"\")$energy)"), strings)#ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ãŒå–ã‚Œãªã‹ã£ãŸã¨ãã®ä¾‹å¤–å‡¦ç†è€ƒãˆã‚‹
                           }
                         }

                       }
                       strings <- gsub("\\+", "=", strings)
                       strings <- gsub("\\-", "\\+", strings)
                       strings <- gsub("=", "\\-", strings)
                       x$fixedEnergy <- eval(parse(text = strings))
                     }
                     base <- as.numeric(self$getEntryFor(startId)$fixedEnergy)
                     for(x in self$Ids){
                       x$fixedEnergy <- x$fixedEnergy - base
                     }
                   },
                   getLinks = function(){
                     mat <- self$Ids %>%
                       lapply(function(x) c(x$id, x$linkId)) %>%
                       do.call(rbind,.)
                     mat <- mat[!is.na(mat[,2]),]
                     mat <- mat[mat[,1]!=mat[,2],]
                     self$links <- mat[,c(2,1)]
                   },
                   plot = function(labelpos = 0){
                     if(is.na(self$links)) self$getLinks() #ã“ã®è¾ºã©ã†ã‚„ã£ã¦å ´åˆåˆ†ã‘ã™ã‚‹ã®ã ã‚ã†ã‹
                     seq <- self$links %>% as.vector() %>% unique()
                     seq %<>% .[order(.)]
                     kv <- seq %>% sapply(function(x) self$getEntryFor(x)$fixedEnergy)
                     gp <- ggplot()
                     gp = gp + ylim(min(kv) - abs(labelpos), max(kv) + abs(labelpos)) + xlim(0,length(seq)*2)
                     for(i in 1:length(seq)){
                       eval(parse(text =#ã“ã†ã—ãªã„ã¨ã†ã¾ãã„ã‹ãªã„ã€‚åˆ†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã€‚
                                    paste0("gp <- gp + geom_segment(aes(x = ",
                                           2*i -2,
                                           " , y=",
                                           kv[seq[i]],
                                           ", xend = ",
                                           2*i -1,
                                           ", yend=",
                                           kv[seq[i]],
                                           "))")))
                     }
                     for(i in 1:length(seq)){
                       eval(parse(text =#ã“ã†ã—ãªã„ã¨ã†ã¾ãã„ã‹ãªã„ã€‚åˆ†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã€‚
                                    paste0("gp <- gp + geom_segment(aes(x = ",
                                           2*i -2,
                                           " , y=",
                                           kv[seq[i]],
                                           ", xend = ",
                                           2*i -1,
                                           ", yend=",
                                           kv[seq[i]],
                                           "))")))
                       eval(parse(text =
                                    paste0("gp <- gp + geom_text(aes(x = ",
                                           2*i -1.5,
                                           " , y=",
                                           kv[seq[i]] + labelpos,
                                           ",label=\"",
                                           self$getEntryFor(seq[i])$label,
                                           "\"))")))
                     }

                     for(i in 1:length(self$links[,1])){
                       eval(parse(text =
                                    paste0("gp <- gp + geom_segment(aes(x = ",
                                           2*(1:length(seq))[seq==self$links[i,1]] -1,
                                           " , y=",kv[self$links[i,1]],
                                           ", xend = ",
                                           (1:length(seq))[seq==self$links[i,2]]*2 -2,
                                           ", yend=",
                                           kv[self$links[i,2]],
                                           "))")))
                     }
                     title <- getwd() %>% {function(x) rev(strsplit(x,split = "/")[[1]])[1]}()
                     gp <- gp + labs(title = title) + xlab("") + ylab("")
                     gp
                   }
                 )
)

IdenticalEntry <- R6Class("IdenticalEntry",
                          public = list(
                            initialize = function(path, parser = NULL, energy = NULL, pointGroup = NULL){
                              self$path <- path
                              self$energy <- energy
                              self$pointGroup <- pointGroup
                              if(!is.null(parser)){
                                res <- self$parseInfoFromPath(parser)
                                self$id <- res[1]
                                self$title <- res[2]
                                self$atomsInout <- res[3]
                                self$linkId <- strsplit(self$atomsInout,split = "\\+|\\-")[[1]][1]
                                label <- strsplit(self$id,split = "EQ|TS")[[1]][2]
                                self$label <- ifelse(is.na(label), "",label)
                              }

                            },
                            parseInfoFromPath = function(parser){
                              parser(self$path)#parserã¯idã¨titleã¨inoutã®ãƒ™ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ¼
                            },
                            parseEnergyFromPath = function(parser){
                              self$energy <- parser(self$path)
                            },
                            parsepointGroupFromPath = function(parser){
                              self$pointGroup <- parser(self$path)
                            },
                            path = character(),
                            id = character(),
                            title = character(),
                            atomsInout = character(),
                            energy = numeric(),
                            fixedEnergy = numeric(),
                            pointGroup = character(),
                            linkId = character(),
                            label = character()
                          )
)

dirNameParser <- function(dirpath){
  dirpath %>%
  {function(x) strsplit(x,"_")[[1]]}() %>%
  {function(x) c(paste0(x[1:3],collapse = ""),x[4],x[5])}()
}
main.R

getEnergy <- function(dirpath){
  dirpath %>%
    paste0("/file") %>%
    read_lines %>%
    as.numeric
}

a<-Total$new()
dir(".") %>%
  lapply(function(x) a$add(IdenticalEntry$new(x, dirNameParser, getEnergy(x)))) #ã“ã“ã®getEnergyé–¢æ•°ã¯è‡ªç”±ã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆå¯èƒ½ãªã®ã§ã€gaussianã‚„gamessã®ãƒ­ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰ç›´æ¥ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã¨ã‚ŠãŸã—ãŸã„ã¨ããªã©ã€é©å®œé–¢æ•°ã‚’æ›¸ãæ›ãˆã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
a$fixEnergy("10EQ1")
a$plot(1)
a$links
a$links %<>% rbind(c("33TS", "90EQ4"))
a$plot(-1)

åŒ–å­¦åˆæˆã«ãŠã„ã¦æœ€é©åŒ–ã™ã¹ãå ´æ‰€ãŒåˆ†ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

åŒ–å­¦åˆæˆã«ãŠã„ã¦ã€æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«åŒã˜ç‰©è³ªãŒå‡ºæ¥ã‚‹å ´åˆã§ã‚‚è¤‡æ•°ã®çµŒè·¯ãŒè€ƒãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
ã“ã†ã„ã†ã¨ãã«ã€ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’ã¤ãã£ã¦ã‚ã’ã‚‹ã¨ã€ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã®çµŒè·¯ãŒé‡è¦ãªåå¿œã§ã‚ã‚‹ã‹ãŒç†è§£ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚
ä»Šå›ã®ä¾‹ã ã¨ã€å›³ã§ã„ã†èµ¤ã®çµŒè·¯ã®æ–¹ãŒé’ã®çµŒè·¯ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ã®é«˜ä½å·®ï¼ˆæ´»æ€§åŒ–ã‚¨ãƒãƒ«ã‚®ãƒ¼ï¼‰ãŒå°ã•ãã€åå¿œã«ãŠã„ã¦ä¸»è¦ãªçµŒè·¯ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã„ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚

body:
Hello world !!
ä»Šå›ã¯ã€ifconfigã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«ä»£ã‚ã‚‹ipã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§IPv4ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚ 
ç°¡å˜ãªå‚™å¿˜éŒ²ãªã®ã§ã€è©³ç´°ã¯**man ip** (ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã¯ã€**man ip-address**) ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§è¦‹ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

# ç’°å¢ƒ
- CentOS 7.4 (on VirtualBox)

# è¨­å®š
è¨­å®šå†…å®¹ã¯ã€**ipv4ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹=192.168.0.1/24**ã€**ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ‡ãƒã‚¤ã‚¹å=enp0s3**ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

```
# ip address add 192.168.0.1/24 dev enp0s3
```

**ip address** ã¯ã€**ip a** ã«çœç•¥å¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚
ã¡ãªã¿ã«ã€IPv6 address ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã®éƒ¨åˆ†ã‚’IPv6ã«ã™ã‚Œã°è¨­å®šã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚



è¨­å®šå†…å®¹ã®ç¢ºèªã¯ã€

```
$ ip a
```

ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã¯ã€

```
$ ip a sh enp0s3
```


è¨­å®šã—ãŸã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯

```
# ip a delete 192.168.0.1/24 dev enp0s3
```

title: [ã¨ã‚ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ: IPv4 address] ipã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã€IPv4 Address ã‚’è¨­å®š
